Author: baswild
Text: Recovery looks different for everyone! it’s okay that you’re still having thoughts even though you consider yourself recovered, you can’t control your thoughts! try to forgive yourself. my best advice would be to work with a registered eating disorder dietician to lose those 10 lbs? i’m all for body positivity but if you genuinely believe that it would help your endometriosis pain than it’s at least worth a consultation.
